title: Journalist exposes systematic school resource inequities
description: Journalist exposes systematic school resource inequities
content:
Scenario: Journalist exposes systematic school resource inequities
    Given the journalist investigates education equity
    And suspects under-resourcing of schools serving students of color
    When the Observer analyzes district resource distribution
    Then the journalist sees experienced teachers concentrate in white affluent schools
    And documents gifted programs and AP courses cluster by race and class
    And finds per-student spending disparities of thousands of dollars
    And shows facility quality varies dramatically by neighborhood
    And publishes investigation exposing structural educational racism
